description.value:
Cleric Subdomain

Associated Domain(s): Evil, Law

Associated Deities: Achaekek, Alichino, Alocer, Ardad Lili, Asmodeus, Baalzebul, Barbariccia, Barbatos, Belial, Bifrons, Cagnazzo, Calcabrina, Circiatto, Crocell, Deumus, Dispater, Doloras, Draghignazzo, Eaqueo, Eiseth, Eligos, Farfarello, Furcas, Gaap, General Susumu, Geryon, Graffiacane, Haborym, Hadregash, Iaozrael, Jiraviddain, Kalma, Libicocco, Lissala, Lorcan, Lorthact, Losarkur, Mahathallah, Malacoda, Malthus, Mammon, Mephistopheles, Minderhal, Moloch, Nergal, Ose, Pirias, Quindiovatos, Rasvocel, Rubicante, Ruzel, Sabnach, Scarmiglione, Sicva, Titivilus, Uruskreil, Vapula, Vois, Wylgart, Xhasnaphar, Yaezhing, Yan-gant-y-tan, Zaebos, Zepar, Zon-Kuthon

Replacement Power: The following granted power replaces the touch of evil power of the Evil domain or the touch of law power of the Law domain. Devils are a race of lawful evil outsiders.

Replacement Domain Spells: 1st-command, 3rd-suggestion, 6th-planar binding (devils only).
